    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item()
        Class constructor for an item.

      • Item

        public Item(int id,
    java.lang.String name,
    int category,
    double price,
    java.lang.String desc,
    java.lang.Boolean visibility,
    int quantity,
    int quality)
        Class constructor specifying the details of the object.
        Parameters:
        id - contains item's id
        name - contains the name of the item
        category - contains an integer that represents an index of the Categories array
        price - contains a double for the price of the item
        desc - contains the description/comment of the item
        visibility - determines whether the item is shared publicly or privately
        quantity - contains an integer 1..* for the amount that the owner has of the item
        quality - contains an integer that describes the item's quality; 0 is new and 1 is used

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return the new printing format of the item.

        The new format of item is [name]\n[price].

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string consisting of the item's name with its price and quantity in a new line
